title: Namma Yatri - Auto Booking App
description:
Available in Bengaluru, Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kochi, Mysore & Tumkur, Namma Yatri is a community initiative that provides hassle-free auto & cab booking experience for its customers. Built with feedback from drivers & customers, the app strives to build a sustainable, long-term, and transparent mobility solution. Whether it's an easy commute to the office or a quick pick-up for a weekend hangout, Namma Yatri has got you covered with its autos & cabs!

The Namma Yatri Difference

Namma Yatri charges its driver zero commission! This means you pay less and the driver earns more - it’s magic!
100% payment goes directly to the driver without any cuts or any middlemen
It is already India’s most ❤️ app by drivers and customers alike
We only assign trips to drivers closeby so you get lightning fast bookings and your assigned driver reaches your location in no time
Our drivers are super happy and hence there are low cancellations thereby providing you happy rides
All our data is 100% Open. Check it out at nammayatri.in/open

Booking autos & cabs has never been this easy & hassle-free!

How to book an auto through Namma yatri auto booking app

✅ Download Namma Yatri auto booking app
✅ Signup on the app with your phone number
✅ Pick your drop location and then confirm your pickup location
✅ Choose your driver or let us assign the nearest driver
✅ Start your ride
✅ Pay the driver directly through cash or UPI, at the end of the trip

Feature highlights

🛺Quick and easy booking: Install - Signup - Book- Pay & Repeat, you can book an auto to come at your doorstep.
🛺Fast, Easy & Safe: Find an auto ride easily with a few taps on your mobile and enjoy a hassle-free ride.
🛺Choose your Driver or let us assign: The choice is yours! You can choose from the best-rated drivers available near you, or let us choose the nearest auto available.
🛺Save your favorite locations: You no longer need to set the location every time you book a ride; you can pick it up from your marked locations without hassle.
🛺Repeat Ride: Book your office ride every day without hassle. Click on "Repeat ride" instead of entering your pickup and drop location all over again.
🛺Navigation and Real-time tracking: Track your Ride in real-time and know exactly when your auto will arrive and where you're commuting with the best-in-class maps technology.
🛺Affordable fares: Our fares are fair and affordable, so you don't have to worry about overpaying for your Ride. No haggling. No bargaining. No waste of time.
🛺Consistent Pricing: No extra charges during peak hours.
🛺Direct Payment: Pay directly to the Driver in cash or UPI.
🛺100% Transparency: No hidden charges; you can check the rate card to know the breakdown of your Ride. Rate the Ride and give feedback for improvement.
🛺 Multiple languages to choose from – Access Namma Yatri in English, Hindi & Kannada & Hindi

Reviews from Customers

“I used the app during peak hours. Not only did I get paired immediately, the fare displayed was very reasonable given the distance. I would highly recommend this over other apps and congrats to the team for solving one of Bengaluru's persistent problems.” - Konchady

“Best app for booking auto in Bangalore. Most of the time drivers will be available in 10 mins at the maximum. Availability has been the best feature in this.” - Vamsi

“Reliable travel partner in Namma metro city Bengaluru. Faster response and tension free booking.. So far, I didn't see any issues with booking or traveling. Loved it!!” - Punithraj

Follow us on our social media platforms and stay updated:

Instagram: https://instagram.com/namma.yatri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nammayatri
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@nammayatri
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100086954202593


Get to know more about us at https://www.nammayatri.in/

summary: Auto Booking App - Low Cancellations, Fast Pickups & Affordable Fares
comments: When it started, the app was very convenient, the drivers would accept on time and the fare was reasonable. Now the drivers have started demanding extra fee. They either take a longer route so that the end fare shows more or they demand extra when the trip ends and are rude when you don't agree to give. Sometimes the location shown to the driver and the user has some discrepancy. Have been using this for around 2 months now and not liking it at all. EDIT: GOT SCAMMED AGAIN. GOOGLE SHOULD BAN

Absolutely no value for the passengers. It has happened multiple times that the driver takes a longer route unnecessarily and fare is updated at the end saying that the trip was longer by so much distance. There's no support and no use raising a ticket. You never get a response. Existence of proper support on apps like Uber make them much better.

Starting they were easily available but nowdays they are charging more compared to Ola. Suddenly at the end point they charge higher cost . Even the auto drivers take a longer route . Upon that issue with address ,it doesn't take the right address only when we add in it. Ola or Uber was better with rates atleast they used not change the rates all of sudden

First off, this app is so damn buggy. I open it to book an auto and voila, it's frozen. Have to close it from recents and then open again. Second, it should have an option to book without the location enabled. Sometimes we don't book from our current location. What a stupid feature. Third, I booked from a specific location, confirmed it 2-3 times and after booking also it was showing the pickup location I entered. But the driver is shown a location somewhere 10 kms far. What stupidity. 0 star👎

Hey, why did you stop giving the option to choose multiple drivers while booking? Multiple drivers used to quote multiple fares and customer had the option to choose the lower fare. Now it's pretty straight forward and no option to choose. It's not an useful update. The one thing that separated you guys from other auto booking app is this feature. Now I do not have any reason to book from your app. I'd like this reviewed and bring back the old option.
